捀字的基本解释

捀
péng
古同“捧”。
两手分而数。

捀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［féng］
［《廣韻》符容切，平鍾，奉。］
［《廣韻》扶用切，去宋，奉。］
(1)同“捧”。两手托物。
(2)见“捀子”。

捀字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　捀； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页432第18
【唐韻】【集韻】?敷容切，音峰。【說文】奉也。　又【唐韻】扶用切【集韻】房用切，?音俸。義同。一曰兩手分而數也。　又符容切，音逢。義同。或省作?。亦作捧。通作摓。互詳摓字註。

捀字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
捀字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Beat
péng
Gu Tong "holds".
Two hands are divided and counted.
Beat
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［féng］
["Guangyun" Fu Rongqie, Pingzhong, Feng. ]
["Guangyun" help to use cutting, go to Song, Feng. ]
(1) Same as "peng". Hold things in both hands.
(2) See "Zizi".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　捀; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 432 18
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Apply Rong Qi, sound peak. [Said Wen] Feng Ye.　[Tang Yun] Helping to use cuts [Ji Yun] Room to use cuts,? Yin Feng. The same meaning. One said two hands are divided and counted.　Fu Rongqi and Yin Feng. The same meaning. Or save it?. Also for holding. The pass is made. Note each other in detail.
